f.thumbnail.ts: captureThumbnail() - WebGL canvas to base64 JPEG thumbnail

x: htmlToDom(html): Converts HTML string to DOM, appends to body
isMobile: Boolean for mobile device detection
blockTypeToHex(type): BlockType enum to hex color string
captureThumbnail(renderer): WebGL canvas to base64 JPEG (240x180, quality 0.7)
